body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #20199 (Ignoring (but warn) on dublicate -wallet parameters by jonasschnelli)
* #20167 (test: Add test for -blockversion by MarcoFalke)
* #20046 (depends: Set CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH for native packages by ryanofsky)
* #19910 (net processing: Move peer_map to PeerManager by jnewbery)
* #19690 (util: improve FindByte() performance by LarryRuane)
* #19471 (util: Make default arg values more specific by hebasto)
* #19425 (refactor: Get rid of more redundant chain methods by ryanofsky)
* #19160 (multiprocess: Add basic spawn and IPC support by ryanofsky)
* #19137 (wallettool: Add dump and createfromdump commands by achow101)
* #18980 (build: Decouple clientversion.cpp from the git repo by hebasto)
* #18904 (Don't call lsn_reset in periodic flush by bvbfan)
* #17580 (refactor: Add ALLOW_LIST flags and enforce usage in CheckArgFlags by ryanofsky)
* #17211 (Allow fundrawtransaction and walletcreatefundedpsbt to take external inputs by achow101)
* #16545 (refactor: Implement missing error checking for ArgsManager flags by ryanofsky)
* #16365 (Log RPC parameters (arguments) if -debug=rpcparams by LarryRuane)
* #15936 (Unify bitcoin-qt and bitcoind persistent settings by ryanofsky)
* #15719 (Wallet passive startup by ryanofsky)
* #11082 (Add new bitcoin_rw.conf file that is used for settings modified by this software itself by luke-jr)
* #10443 (Add fee_est tool for debugging fee estimation code by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).
